questions.question: True or false? Electrons are larger than molecules.
True or false? The Atlantic Ocean is the biggest ocean on Earth.
True or false? The chemical make up food often changes when you cook it.
True or false? Sharks are mammals.
True or false? The human body has four lungs.
True or false? Atoms are most stable when their outer shells are full.
True or false? Filtration separates mixtures based upon their particle size.
True or false? Venus is the closest planet to the Sun.
True or false? Conductors have low resistance.
True or false? Molecules can have atoms from more than one chemical element.
